name: Combo Fighters (name in progress)
description:
This is only a playtest level. It is not a demo because I have a lot in store for this game. Please feel free to email me about any concerns, comments, issues, ideas, etc. at alientate0561@gmail.com. I'd love to hear from anyone about the game. I need to know what you think about it and what you think I can improve. It is meant to be a challenge but, for example, tell me if it is too hard and tell me how it can be easier. 

Controls...

Leave Game: Esc

Kuli:

Jump: S

Attack: A

Igna:

Jump: J

Attack: K
